pages.title: Salt Command
pages.subtitle: Salt is the currency that Rengetsu uses.

fields.name: Usage: /salt balance
fields.value: This will show you how much salt you have.

fields.name: Usage: /salt balance [user]
fields.value: Specifying a **user** will show how much salt they have instead.

fields.name: Usage: /salt claim
fields.value: This command lets you gain 2000 salt once per day.

fields.name: Usage: /salt remind
fields.value: Enabling reminders will remind you at 0:00 UTC that your daily salt is available to be claimed.

fields.name: Usage: /salt give <user> <amount>
fields.value: You can give **user** salt as specified by the **amount** with this command. You cannot give a bot salt.
